dct_title_s: The Sacramento Valley from the American River to Butte Creek
dct_description_sm: surveyed & drawn by order of Genl. Riley, commandg. 10th Military Dept. by Lieut. Derby, Topl. Engrs., September & October, 1849.
Important California Gold Rush map by Lt. George H. Derby, from Tyson's Information in Relation to the Geology and Topography of California, perhaps the earliest scientific work on the Gold rush.
"S. Ex. Doc. No. 47, Part 2nd, 1st Sess., 31st Cong."
